Name: Ginger Beer Daiquiri
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: *Note: Angostura aromatic bitters contain alcohol but in the finished drink the alcohol level is negligible.
History: Created in 2006 by Audrey Saunders in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Ginger Beer Daiquiri contains 88 calories
